content.text:
# 5th Asia Pacific Screen Awards

| gold             =
| hall_of_fame     =
| best_film        = A Separation
| best_actor       = Wang Baoqiang
| best_actress     = Nadezhda Markina
| most_wins        =
| most_nominations = Once Upon a Time in Anatolia (5)
| network          =
| last             = 4th
| next             = 6th
}}
The 5th Asia Pacific Screen Awards were held in 2011.
